description.excerpt:
This repository implements a Gaussian mixture model in tensorflow.
Note that the code can quickly be changed to have a GMM as last layer of a neural network
Gumbel sampling is used such that the GMM can be used as latent layer for e.g. a variational autoencoder (see ref)

installation.excerpt: This code can be run with tensorflow GPU to train the GMM accelearted

invocation.excerpt: This code can be run with tensorflow GPU to train the GMM accelearted

long_title.excerpt: Gaussian mixture model implemented using tensorflow 2.0

usage.excerpt:
The GMM.py file can train 2 GMM's. One with label 0 and one with label 1.
To train your GMM put your pickled data in the data folder with numpy array format (NxD) and name: "data_set"
If you have labels put them in the data folder with name "labels"
If you don't have labels, synthetically make label data by using np.ones((N,))
